Summary: Standing on my front porch when I saw the object
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was just getting dark out and I was on my porch having a smoke when I noticed a large red light flying below the air traffic from seattle and Seatac. As I watched it going from south to north it all of a sudden took a sharpe angle turn towards the east(Seattle)The strange thing was the size of the red light it was so much larger the the airplanes light that I see everyday, and being near the airports I see planes of all sizes(even military). I was watching UFO Hunters and the object I saw sounds exactly the same as those in Stevensville Texas that I read about the next morning.Then in Feb I saw a very simillar object that was just hovering and was a very huge bright red light that didn't move for atleast 10 minutes then all of a sudden the object moved up to the left then flashed a very bright white light then vanished.. I just been wondering if anyone else in the Seattle Bremerton area has seen the same objects I saw in january and febuary... they were so noticable I don't know how anyone out couldn't of noticed..If I can get feedback it would be great, because we're not alone and I don't fear the TRUTH! Thank You Tim
